General.Name: Sejin T.S Co.Ltd
General.Description: Sejin T.S Co.,Ltd produces and sells specialty functional base film products in Korea. The company offers printing optical films for LCD backlights; film parts for displays, AV, OA tools, electronic parts, vehicles, etc.; and polycarbonate, acryl, co-extrusion, and patterned films. It is also involved in the printing and pressing optical films for display; and secondary functional film conversion. The company was formerly known as SEJIN Co. and changed its name to Sejin T.S Co.,Ltd in June 1996. Sejin T.S Co.,Ltd was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Anseong, South Korea.
